Musigen Concept Application

Created a website design for a concept of an application idea involving different music genres and their respective art styles. In this project, I utilized Wordpress to design the interface of the application. For creative assets, I utilized Adobe Photoshop and Illustrator to create logos and mockopups that are used throughout the design.


Planet Z Videogame

Developed a 2D platformer video game using GDevelop game engine. I created all the art assets used in the game with programs such as Aseprite for pixel art and Photoshop for general art. There is also music that was created by using the digital audio workstation, Ableton, to create a soundtrack for the video game.


Ambient Genre Blog

Created a blog web page design using HTML and CSS. There were media queries utilized so that the page can be scaled and read on other devices such as mobile.
